app

Class MyImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.MyImage

  • public class MyImage
extends Object
    Basically a BufferedImage Container with consistant graphics setting kept in PaintBrush object. Use its own getgraphics method to be working on same graphics over time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MyImage(int width, int height)
      Creates BufferedImage and sets its type to BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB and creates graphics object of it to be used constantly.
      Sets static TwoPoint maximum limits accordingly to image size.
      Creates PaintBrush object which default settings are width = 1, override = SRC, Color = Color.black.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBrushComposite() 
      int getBrushWidth() 
      Color getColor() 
      Graphics2D getGraphics() 
      BufferedImage getImg() 
      void setBrush(PaintBrush brush) 
      void setBrushWidth(int width) 
      void setColor(Color c) 
      void setImg(BufferedImage img) 
      void setOverride(boolean override) 
      void thicken()
      increases graphics draw stroke width by 1.
      Will not go above of max width set in brush.
      void thin()
      reduces graphics draw stroke width by 1.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyImage

        public MyImage(int width,
               int height)
        Creates BufferedImage and sets its type to BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB and creates graphics object of it to be used constantly.
        Sets static TwoPoint maximum limits accordingly to image size.
        Creates PaintBrush object which default settings are width = 1, override = SRC, Color = Color.black. Sets settings from brush to graphics.
        Parameters:
        width - - width of image
        height - - height of image
        throws exception either of params if below 1.

    • Method Detail

      • thin

        public void thin()
        reduces graphics draw stroke width by 1.
        Will not go below 1.

      • thicken

        public void thicken()
        increases graphics draw stroke width by 1.
        Will not go above of max width set in brush.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(Color c)

      • setOverride

        public void setOverride(boolean override)
        Parameters:
        override - true = composite will be SRC.
        false = composite will be DST_OVER

      • setBrush

        public void setBrush(PaintBrush brush)
        Parameters:
        brush - sets brush to be current setting container and will also install said settings from it to itself.

      • setImg

        public void setImg(BufferedImage img)
        Parameters:
        img - sets own image to this. Updates Area.class max values. Calls refreshSettings() to set graphical settings from brush onto new img.
        throws exception if null

      • setBrushWidth

        public void setBrushWidth(int width)
        Parameters:
        width - - setter that will not break limits from brush.

        public int getBrushWidth()

        public int getBrushComposite()
